title: Merge K Sorted Lists

explanation.complexity: Time: O(n log k), Space: O(1)

title: Reverse Nodes in K-Group

explanation.analogy: Reverse group, connect to next group.

title: Trapping Rain Water

explanation.approach: Two pointers tracking max from each side.
explanation.analogy: Water at each bar = min(leftMax, rightMax) - height.

title: N-Queens

explanation.analogy: Place queen if safe, backtrack if not.

title: Word Search II

steps: For each word, try DFS from each cell
explanation.complexity: Time: O(m × n × words × 4^L), Space: O(L)

title: Minimum Window Substring

explanation.analogy: Expand until valid, shrink while valid.
steps: Expand right until all chars found

title: Serialize Deserialize BT
Binary Tree Max Path Sum

explanation.analogy: At each node, consider path through it.
steps: Update global with path through node
